mapper.select: select id, pid, siteid, name, folder, status, url, img, keywords, content, viewsite, viewapp, pageviewsite, pageviewapp from DS_CMS_CATEGORY where ID=#{id} and SITEID=#{siteid} order by SEQ

select id, siteid, categoryid, title, url, keywords, summary, content, releasetime, img from DS_CMS_PAGE where SITEID=#{siteid} and CATEGORYID in (${idArray}) and IMGTOP=1 and PAGETOP=1 and RELEASETIME<=#{releasetime} order by RELEASETIME ${order}
select count(1) from DS_CMS_PAGE where SITEID=#{siteid} and CATEGORYID in (${idArray}) and IMGTOP=1 and PAGETOP=1 and RELEASETIME<=#{releasetime}
